title: TOOL Adds Two Mexico Dates To Their 2025 Live Plans
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
text: Tool recently announced their first-ever destination festival named Tool Live In The Sand, and now they've got two additional Mexican shows around it! The shows will take place on March 12 in Monterrey at the Explanada del Estadio Mobil Super, and on March 15 in Mexico City at the Explanada del Estadio Azteca. Outside that, Tool Live In The Sand is set to take place at the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino and Royalton resorts in Punta Cana, Dominican Republic between March 7 and 9, 2025. The festival is headlined by Tool playing two sets, which should be interesting to see what rarities or lesser-played songs they bust out. The festival also features Primus, Mastodon, and a bunch more. The full lineup is: Tool (playing two sets) Primus Mastodon Coheed & Cambria Eagles Of Death Metal King's X Fishbone Wheel CKY Moonwalker Tickets and information are available here. The full list of Tool live performances for 2025 (so far) are: 3/7-9 Punta Cana, DR TOOL Live in the Sand3/12 Monterrey, MX Explanada del Estadio Mobil Super3/15 Mexico City, MX Explanada del Estadio Azteca3/18 Guadalajara, MX Calle 23/22 Buenos Aires, AR Lollapalooza Argentina3/23 Santiago, CL Lollapalooza Chile3/28 Bogota, CO Estéreo Picnic3/30 São Paulo, BR Lollapalooza Brasil Want More Metal?
